DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : Chronic Fatigue Syndrome ( CFS ) medically unexplained condition characterize severe disable fatigue . To date much research focus find whether CFS cause mainly physical psychological factor . Perhaps result , study examine relationship CFS quality life , particular , positive aspect mental health , individual 's sense purpose , autonomy close relationship . This study address limitation examine Ryff 's ( 1989 ) six domains psychological well-being ( PWB ) , aspects well-being include positive emotion , CFS . It also examine relationship measure symptomology , emotional distress PWB . Method : This cross-sectional , questionnaire-based study clinical sample adult CFS . Participants complete valid measure well-being symptomology . Results : We expect find compare general population norm , individual CFS score low measure PWB . Secondly , expect PWB dimension related symptom measure . There however , ground make strong prediction . Implications : This study advance understanding quality life CFS . Clinically , potential enrich inform therapeutic intervention .
